statements: UPDATE security_events SET event_type='Login', event_description='User logged in', event_timestamp='2022-01-01 08:00:00', event_source='Web' WHERE event_id=1;
UPDATE security_events SET event_type='Logout', event_source='Mobile', event_timestamp='2022-01-02 10:30:00', event_description='User logged out' WHERE event_id=2;
UPDATE security_events SET event_type='Login Success', event_description='User logged in successfully.', event_timestamp='2022-10-15 08:30:00', event_source='Web App' WHERE event_id=1001;

UPDATE security_events SET event_description='User attempted login with invalid credentials.', event_timestamp='2022-10-16 12:45:00', event_type='Login Failure', event_source='Mobile App' WHERE event_id=1002;
UPDATE security_events SET event_type='Login' WHERE event_id=101;
UPDATE incident_response SET affected_systems='Server A, Server B' WHERE incident_id=201;
UPDATE security_events SET event_description='Unauthorized access detected' WHERE event_id=101
UPDATE incident_response SET response_actions='Isolate affected systems, investigate root cause' WHERE incident_id=202
UPDATE security_events SET event_name = 'Login Event' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE threat_detection SET detection_details = 'Security breach detected' WHERE detection_id = 5;
UPDATE security_events SET event_name = 'New Event Name', event_description = 'Updated Event Description' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE threat_detection SET threat_name = 'New Threat Name', detection_details = 'Updated Detection Details', detection_time = current_timestamp WHERE detection_id = 2;
UPDATE security_events SET event_type = 'Endpoint Security' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE threat_detection SET detection_score = 95, detection_description = 'Malware detected' WHERE detection_id = 3;
UPDATE security_events SET event_description = 'Updated description', event_timestamp = '2022-01-01' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE incidents SET incident_description = 'New incident details', severity_level = 3, incident_type = 'Data Breach' WHERE incident_id = 2;
UPDATE SecurityEvents SET event_description = 'Updated description' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE Devices SET device_type = 'Updated type', device_location = 'Updated location' WHERE device_id = 3;
UPDATE SecurityEvents SET event_timestamp = '2022-05-01 10:30:00' WHERE event_id = 5;
UPDATE Incidents SET incident_severity = 3, incident_description = 'Updated description' WHERE incident_id = 10;
